Uses of Class
com.here.android.mpa.mapping.MapPolygon

  • Packages that use MapPolygon 
    Package Description
    com.here.android.mpa.customlocation
    This package provides classes and interfaces that support custom location searches.
    com.here.android.mpa.mapping
    The mapping package provides classes, interfaces, and enumerations that display an interactive map, and related functionality that allows your application to create and add map content.

    • Uses of MapPolygon in com.here.android.mpa.customlocation

      Methods in com.here.android.mpa.customlocation that return types with arguments of type MapPolygon 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.List<MapPolygon> Result.PolygonGeometry.createMapPolygons()
      Helper method that creates array of MapPolygon based on the geometry.
      java.util.List<java.util.List<MapPolygon>> Result.MultiPolygonGeometry.createMapPolygons()
      Helper method that creates a list of lists of MapPolygon based on this geometry.

    • Uses of MapPolygon in com.here.android.mpa.mapping

      Methods in com.here.android.mpa.mapping that return MapPolygon 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      MapPolygon MapPolygon.setFillColor(int color)
      Sets a fill color for this MapPolygon, using an ARGB (Alpha/Red/Green/Blue) integer color value.
      MapPolygon MapPolygon.setGeodesicEnabled(boolean enabled)
      Specifies whether to draw each segment of the represented GeoPolygon as a geodesic.
      MapPolygon MapPolygon.setGeoPolygon(GeoPolygon polygon)
      Changes the GeoPolygon rendered by this MapPolygon.
      MapPolygon MapPolygon.setLineColor(int color)
      Sets a border line color for this MapPolygon, using an ARGB (Alpha/Red/Green/Blue) integer color value.
      MapPolygon MapPolygon.setLineWidth(int width)
      Sets a border line width, in pixels, for this MapPolygon, an int value within the [0..100] range.
